targets.rawSql:
SELECT sum(heap_blks_read) as heap_read, sum(heap_blks_hit)  as heap_hit, (sum(heap_blks_hit) - sum(heap_blks_read)) / sum(heap_blks_hit) as ratio
FROM pg_statio_user_tables

SELECT
        sum(idx_blks_read) AS idx_read,
        sum(idx_blks_hit) AS idx_hit,
        (sum(idx_blks_hit) - sum(idx_blks_read)) / sum(idx_blks_hit) AS ratio
FROM
        pg_statio_user_indexes

SELECT schemaname AS "Schema",
       relname AS "Relation", 
  CASE WHEN (seq_scan + idx_scan) != 0
    THEN 100.0 * idx_scan / (seq_scan + idx_scan) 
    ELSE 0
  END AS percent_of_times_index_used,
  n_live_tup AS rows_in_table
FROM
        pg_stat_user_tables 
WHERE
        n_live_tup > 0
ORDER BY n_live_tup DESC

SELECT d.datname AS Name, pg_catalog.pg_get_userbyid(d.datdba) AS Owner,
  CASE WHEN pg_catalog.has_database_privilege(d.datname, 'CONNECT')
    THEN pg_catalog.pg_size_pretty(pg_catalog.pg_database_size(d.datname)) 
    ELSE 'No Access' 
  END AS SIZE 
FROM pg_catalog.pg_database d 
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN pg_catalog.has_database_privilege(d.datname, 'CONNECT') 
    THEN pg_catalog.pg_database_size(d.datname)
    ELSE NULL 
  END

SELECT
        nspname AS "Scheme",
        relname AS "Relation",
        pg_total_relation_size(C.oid) AS "total_size"
FROM
        pg_class C
LEFT JOIN
        pg_namespace N ON (N.oid = C.relnamespace)
WHERE
        nspname NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'information_schema')
AND
        C.relkind <> 'i'
AND
        nspname !~ '^pg_toast'
ORDER BY
        pg_total_relation_size(C.oid) DESC

SELECT
        schemaname AS "Schema",
        relname AS "Relation",
        last_vacuum,
        last_autovacuum,
        last_analyze,
        last_autoanalyze,
        n_live_tup,
        n_dead_tup,
        n_live_tup * 100. / ( n_live_tup + n_dead_tup) AS level
from
        pg_stat_user_tables
where
        n_dead_tup > 0
order by
        n_dead_tup desc

SELECT t.relname, l.locktype, page, virtualtransaction, pid, mode, granted 
FROM pg_locks l, pg_stat_all_tables t 
WHERE l.relation = t.relid ORDER BY relation asc

panels.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
panels.title: Temp File

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk.
sync_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk.

targets.rawSql: select usename, count(usename) as connections from pg_stat_activity where query not like '<%' group by usename order by connections desc
select application_name, count(application_name) as connections from pg_stat_activity where query not like '<%' group by application_name order by connections desc
